ad_text: Tower Health - Careers Sponsored Surgical Technologists: Your dream career awaits at Reading Hospital - Tower Health with NEW increased rates and a clinical ladder for advancement! #BeInspired to assist the surgical team while utilizing state-of-the-art equipment in multiple surgical specialties. Grow in your career with opportunities to learn various complex procedures. Pursue your passion and apply today! WHY READING HOSPITAL? • NEW increased rates • Generous time off, tuition assistance, and comprehensive benefits • Magnet® designated, 697-bed hospital with 24 Operating Rooms (two with hybrid capabilities) and 4 Davinci Robotics systems • Recognized by Healthgrades 50 Best Hospitals™ Award (2022-2023) • Reading Hospital is considered a Center for Excellence in Bariatric Surgery & Total Join Replacement Surgery To learn more and apply, visit: https://bit.ly/SurgTechRates #SurgTech #SurgTechJobs #TeamTower Tower Health - Careers Apply now

Tower Health - Careers Sponsored Registered Nurses: Reading Hospital - Tower Health is seeking a Churn Nurse for the Neuro/Trauma IMU. #BeInspired to collaborate with a multidisciplinary team that specializes in intermediate care for a diverse and complex patient population. This unit offers a wide variety of clinical experiences including trauma, medical, neurosurgery, and general surgery. Join our dynamic, patient-centered team and apply today! HTTPS://BIT.LY/CHURNRN RNs: Reading Hospital is seeking a Churn Nurse! Tower Health is Hiring! Search available jobs or submit your resume now by visiting this link. Tower Health - Careers Sponsored Physical Therapists: Join Reading Hospital - Tower Health or Reading Hospital Rehabilitation at Wyomissing for an exciting career and #SignOnBonus delivering inpatient physical therapy. Tower Health - Careers Sponsored Histotechnologists: Join Reading Hospital - Tower Health and receive a $10K #SignOnBonus for those with a minimum of 12 months of experience! #BeInspired to utilize state-of-the-art equipment alongside 190+ professionals in our CAP-accredited laboratory. Our lab offers specialized testing, lab automation, and opportunities to be part of cross-function processes. Apply today for a rewarding career with Reading Hospital! Tower Health - Careers Sponsored Registered Nurses: Discover your passion and build your career with our NEW Nurse Exploration Program! About the Nurse Exploration Program • Individualized, 12-month program with mentors and preceptors • Gain a solid foundation in nursing working on a Med/Surg unit • Enhance your marketability to specialty units • Optimize your career path with specialty shadow programs Apply today: https://bit.ly/RNExplore or email HR directly: Jennifer.Tregear@towerhealth.org.
